Encryption - Class in <Unnamed>
Encrypts all your notes and tasks! Uses AES 256 encryption, so the weak point is most likely your password.

P

PersonalTask - Class in <Unnamed>
Class for personal tasks These tasks are different in nature because instead of being done by a certain date, we consider personal tasks to be done in a certain time of day (such as the morning), or a certain number of times, such as every other week
PersonalTask(int, int) - Constructor for class PersonalTask
Creates a new PersonalTask object
